examples.title: Creating forms with Form Builder
examples.example: Create forms with Form Builder, the Orbeon Forms visual form designer. It allows you to build and deploy forms in minutes right from your web browser. Add form fields, including rich controls such as date, currency, file attachments and more. Group your fields in sections. Define validation logic, visibility rules, initial values. Prepopulate fields calling web or REST services. And much more, all right from your web browser, with Form Builder.
This sample form shows image attachments, rich text, repeating form fields, as-you-type validation, the error summary, localization, automatic preview page and automatic PDF generation.

This sample form is based on a real-life form (a California Department of Motor Vehicles form). It shows data capture and validation, repeating sections, and generating great-looking PDF from templates.
This sample forms showcases, in one single forms, all the form controls available out of the box in Form Builder.
This sample form is very simple and can be entirely created in about 10 minutes as shown in the Form Builder screencast.
examples.banner: Form Builder is a powerful tool to create forms, but if you are a developer and you are considering to create forms by writing XForms by hand, see these examples coded in XForms.
